SELECT l.user_id, u.user_name AS lawyer_name, l.counseling_amount, l.law_firm, c.start_time, c.end_time FROM lawyer_detail_tb AS l LEFT JOIN user_tb AS u ON l.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN counsel_request_tb AS c ON l.user_id = c.lawyer_id WHERE u.role = 'lawyer' -- 역할(role)이 변호사(lawyer)인 사람만 가져온다 AND u.status = 1;
